1604065112_mirrored_Flux3PO_github.body: How is this done in Windows with ZeroNet.exe?  Do I need to install Python?  It looks like ZeroNet.exe is a wrapper for python27.dll - so AFAIK - no direct way to call the python script without installing python.  Running "ZeroNet.exe -h" (and --help and /?) doesn't work.
N/m, -h doesn't work but --ui_port does with ZeroNet.exe

topic.title: Is it possible to specify a different inbound port #?
topic.body: My VPN provider gives me a random inbound TCP/UDP port and unfortunately I have no control over what port it's going to be.  Is it possible for me to specify a different port instead of 15441?
